QuestData.Title: Last Stand at Whistling Grove
QuestData.Description: We might have a chance to beat these flames back thanks to your work in the Inferno.$B$BStill, more wildlife is threatened. Keeper Taldros ran north through the flames, to Whistling Grove.$B$BSee if you can help him!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Keeper Taldros at Whistling Grove in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Keeper Taldros at Whistling Grove in Mount Hyjal.
